GapFillInput.Title: Present simple: he and she, like …ing, questions
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets ( ) into the he/she/it form of the Present simple.

Content.Question:
1. Sayed hates (hate) cats.
2. Louise likes (like) flying.
3. Dominic has (have) breakfast at six o’clock.
4. Josh loves (love) his mobile phone.
5. Emilie watches (watch) DVDs a lot.
6. Mona’s boyfriend goes (go) to the cinema every week.
7. Carla stays (stay) with her brother at the weekend.
8. Jin’s wife does (do) a lot of the housework.
9. My sister studies (study) English in the evenings.
10. The shop opens (open) at nine.
